answers.answer: Im 36Weeks today and still dont have anything but a crib with no screws and a diaper genie for that same reason...Everyone keeps saying just wait until after your baby shower... Well my mom and cousin are supposed to be planning my shower but moms been in the hospital for the past month and i feel like im being selfish if i bring it up

What?! Guys please wake up! The weeks are going by really fast so if you don't start buying now when will you?! When your fiancées mom tell you to wait please ask her if it's until she pops out. And you need to ask about the shower otherwise how and when are you going to get the gifts?! Ladies please don't wait the last minute. Last minute shopping you always spend more.
I always bring it up like I'll just have my daughter tomorrow and let her sleep/use all this wonderful stuff I have for her

My fiance has tried buying stuff for her but his mom is always like must be nice to spend money on yourself I need help doing this and if you don't give me your whole pay check you both get kicked out and my fiance doesn't make enough for us to live on our own

Yes valboom is right!My dad told me the same thing I'm going to get your car seat and stroller I'm going to get this and get that. I'm now 40 weeks and me and my bf had to purchase it. Which we don't care but it's the point

Yeah I'm thinking about taking my parents up on their offer and move in with them cuz that's the only way I see my daughter getting what she needs my dad is buying her a car seat and I don't second guess anything he tells me
Luckily the hospital im delivering at provides you with a car seat so im not worried about that!

As hard as it would be, it sounds like you might need to make the move into your parent's house. Seems to me your fiance's mom is being a little selfish in taking the money from you guys all the time, our making you feel bad for spending it. If you are spending money on things your baby needs, you are not just "spending money on yourself".I wound up having my first baby at 35 weeks and didn't realize it until 2 days before (due to preeclampsia). We didn't have the nursery set up at all, and I highly regretted it.Try sitting down and talking to her and tell her you need to buy things now. If anyone else buys you the same thing, you can just return it. But tell her you have to prepare, and you don't have a choice.If she doesn't understand that, then I would seriously consider the move.Good luck. Hope things get better for you soon!

I have tried sitting her down and talking to her but she says well I have cancer and I should get more respect then I'm getting and you and my son going out and buying baby stuff instead of helping out with the bills is selfish but my fiances sister gives her $60 in one night and somehow by the next day she can't find it but she can find 6 packs of cigarettes and constantly buy herself Burger King

Hmm. Yeah. It seems like she is consumed with her own problems. Can be easy to do when you are going through something. But, nonetheless, she is being selfish. I would either just go and buy the stuff and see how she handles it, or like I said before, you may need to move. Sounds like she might have too hard of a time thinking of others right now. :/

I would move into my parent house and let them help because no matter what she is not think of yall at all. Where would your baby sleep you can have your baby early or later and you still have nothing. My mom told me to wait until my baby shower but I still got her somethings because I don't trust people. They tell you one thing and do another. Right now all you should be thinking about is you and your baby and if you mom and dad will help go about your busy for your child. I know it's hard to leave because your bf is one place and you other but yall will come back together once she is born just get everything you need for her now.

Girl, take it from me. My lazy *** Finace and his family sang me the same tune. Everything my baby needs MOMMY GOT IT. I can't just wait around for people to buy stuff that my baby needs NOW. Buy your baby his/her essentials and if his family doesn't like it, then you tell them "I am a expected mom, and I need to make sure my baby has their items before birth, not after"

question: So I am 35 weeks and everything that I have tried to get/buy for my daughter my fiances mom would be like don't waste your money when we go to Florida you will get everything that you will need for Harper...... well Florida has come and gone and I don't have anything for my daughter and the hospital already had to stop my labor last week. I'm really tired of people saying one thing and doing the other.....
title: Vent.
